isis.stitle: HOOD, GRILLE, FENDERS, AND BUMPER - PROSTAR™ - DESCRIPTION - TILT-AWAY BUMPER

svcproc.title: TILT-AWAY BUMPER
svcproc.para: The ProStar™ features a unique, patented, service-friendly tilt-away bumper, which gives mechanics and drivers the ability to stand next to the engine without leaning over, or climbing over, the bumper. The tilt-away bumper also provides extra room for the mechanic who desires to roll under the front corner of the truck on a creeper. The tilt-away bumper rotates on two hinges and is quickly activated by releasing two hand-operated latches.
